message.content: This question tests the understanding of what a successful combination of things means. Option (A) is incorrect because tomatoes and peppers may be tasty together, but it does not necessarily represent a general successful combination. Option (D) is incorrect because sand and socks do not typically go together and do not represent a successful combination.
